ComponentDefinition.LayoutDefinition: <![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <LayoutDefinition xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Layout Name="Footer" Type="RootLayout"> <Prolog /> <Row> <Cell> <Value><div class="footer"> <span>Powered by <a style="color:#fff;" href="http://www.mt.gov.vn" target="_blank" title="Phòng cơ sở dư liệu và phát triển phần mềm-TTCNTT-Bộ GTVT">TTCNTT Bộ GTVT</a></span> </div></Value> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>footer</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>style</Name> <AttributeValue>width:100%;margin:o auto;</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> </Cell> <RowAttributes /> </Row> <Epilog /> <TableAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>cellpadding</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>cellspacing</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>border</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </TableAttributes> </Layout> </LayoutDefinition>]]>
